docket_entries.description: AGENCY CASE docketed. Petition for review filed by Petitioner Wescley Fonseca Pereira. Appearance form due 01/20/2016. Administrative record due 02/16/2016. Copy of petition served on respondent(s) pursuant to FRAP 15(c). [16-1033] (CP) [Entered: 01/06/2016 02:35 PM]

BRIEFING schedule set. Brief due 03/02/2016 for petitioner Wescley Fonseca Pereira. Appendix due 03/02/2016 for petitioner Wescley Fonseca Pereira. Pursuant to F.R.A.P. 31(a), respondent's brief will be due 30 days following service of petitioner's brief and petitioner's reply brief will be due 14 days following service of respondent's brief. [16-1033] (CP) [Entered: 01/22/2016 02:36 PM]

ORDER entered by Sandra L. Lynch, Appellate Judge: On or before August 24, 2016, the parties are directed to file a written response advising the court of the status of any application by petitioner for relief under the Deferred Action for Parents of Americans and Lawful Permanent Residents (DAPA) program. Response due 08/24/2016 for Loretta E. Lynch and Wescley Fonseca Pereira. [16-1033] (DO) [Entered: 08/17/2016 03:58 PM]
